thread.title: Former Gov. Pete Wilson: I'd 'absolutely' do Prop. 187 all over again
thread.title_full: Former Gov. Pete Wilson: I'd 'absolutely' do Prop. 187 all over again

author: MARTIN WISCKOL
title: Former Gov. Pete Wilson: I'd 'absolutely' do Prop. 187 all over again
text: Former Gov. Pete Wilson: I'd 'absolutely' do Prop. 187 all over again Oct. 15, 2015 Updated 5:35 p.m. 1 of 1 Moderator Dr. Jo Ellen Chatham, from left, former California Governor and former U.S Senator Pete Wilson, president and CEO, Freedom Communications, and Orange County Register publisher Richard Mirman, and former U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations organizations in Rome Gaddi Vasquez gather during The Freedom of Speech, Expression and Assembly panel discussion during Orange County Forum in Irvine on Thursday. ED CRISOSTOMO, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER Moderator Dr. Jo Ellen Chatham, from left, former California Governor and former U.S Senator Pete Wilson, president and CEO, Freedom Communications, and Orange County Register publisher Richard Mirman, and former U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations organizations in Rome Gaddi Vasquez gather during The Freedom of Speech, Expression and Assembly panel discussion during Orange County Forum in Irvine on Thursday. ED CRISOSTOMO, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER
